rlVizLib.dynamicLoading
Class AbstractResourceGrabber

java.lang.Object
  rlVizLib.dynamicLoading.AbstractResourceGrabber
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompositeResourceGrabber, LocalDirectoryGrabber, SpecificFileGrabber
public abstract class AbstractResourceGrabber
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract class for all sorts of objects that seek out resources. For example, JarGrabbers that take a directory or web URI and find all of the Jars that are there. Or find Dylibs. In principle, they could be used to find whatever.

Author:
Brian Tanner
